snippet: Anne Neal of the American Council of Trustees and Alumni writes that trustees at the University of Texas at Austin were not the “villains” in a political firestorm over the university’s president.
lead_paragraph: Anne Neal of the American Council of Trustees and Alumni writes that trustees at the University of Texas at Austin were not the “villains” in a political firestorm over the university’s president.
